Module fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

Package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp
  • Class
    Description
    ActivityLogger
    Log user activity to JSON.
    DailyForecastController
    Controls the operation of the daily forecast display.
    DailyForecastData
    A type-class for acquired daily forecast data.
    DisplayHistory
    Displays search history.
    DisplayWeather
    Displays the current weather and forecast.
    ErrorHandler
    Display an error message to the user.
    ErrorLogger
    Error logger.
    HourlyForecastController
    Controls the operation of the hourly forecast display.
    HourlyForecastData
    A type-class for acquired daily forecast data.
    iAPI
    Interface for extracting data from the OpenWeatherMap API.
    iAPICustom
    Interface for extracting data from the OpenWeatherMap API.
    ImageHandler
    The ImageHandler class provides functionality to determine the appropriate image file name based on weather conditions and icon ID.
    iReadAndWriteToFile
    Interface with methods to read from a file and write to a file.
    LocationSearchHandler
    Retrieve the name, latitude, and longitude of the location according to the user input.
    SearchFavoriteController
     
    UnitHandler
    Sets and Changes unit.
    UserActivityModel
    On quit, save user activity to JSON file.
    WeatherAppController
    Controls the main operations of the app.
    WeatherAppXML
    Loads a fxml file and Starts app.
    WeatherData
    A type-class for acquired current weather data.
    WeatherDataFetcher
    Gets data from OpenWeatherMap.
